description:
Serving Olympia Since 1975

At Henderson Law Group in Olympia, Washington, we take pride in offering highly experienced counsel and strong representation to clients throughout the area. We do offer a free intitial consultation except for estate planning matters.

Meet Our Team

Founding attorney Stephen Henderson has been practicing law in Olympia since 1975. Mr. Henderson is a member of the prestigious Million Dollar Advocates Forum, reserved for attorneys who have obtained a verdict or settlement in excess of $1 million. He earned the highest rating in the Martindale-Hubbell Law Directory and received the Thurston County Bar Association Bigelow Award for Lawyer of the Year in 2002. He was also a Certified Financial Planner for more than two decades.

Mr. Henderson is joined in practice by attorney Stephanie Henderson Stocker, who has more than 10 years of experience in negotiation and litigation, and by attorney Simon Stocker, who has handled more than 1,000 criminal cases and hundreds of civil cases over the past 15 years.

In every case, we work as a team to provide our clients with the confident and vigorous advocacy they deserve. When you need a lawyer, it can make all the difference in the world to have an attorney on your side whom you already know and trust. Rely on the legal team at Henderson Law Group to go the extra mile to defend your interests.

Contact Us

Henderson Law Group is conveniently located off Highway 101 near I-5. Our law firm offers evening and weekend appointments by request. We also make jail visits and accept credit cards.
